sentences.sContent: My hostess greeted me with unexpected cordiality.
sentences.sContent_eng: My hostess greeted me with unexpected cordiality.
sentences.sCn: 我的女主人以出乎意外的热诚迎接我。

sentences.sContent: The fat man received him with his usual boisterous cordiality.
sentences.sContent_eng: The fat man received him with his usual boisterous cordiality.
sentences.sCn: 那胖子以他一贯的兴高采烈的热诚接待了他。

sentences.sContent: The head of the organization said in a letter of congratulation to the new pope that he hoped for cordiality and sincere friendship.
sentences.sContent_eng: The head of the organization said in a letter of congratulation to the new pope that he hoped for cordiality and sincere friendship.
sentences.sCn: 而在本尼迪克教皇任职期间两教关系出现问题，该组织领袖在致新教皇的祝贺信中表示，希望两教能促成热诚和真挚的友谊。
